speaker: Mary
text: *Mary, dressed in a light pink bridesmaid dress, scans the crowd of loved ones gathered, her heart swelling with joy.* Oh, Anna looks absolutely stunning! Don't you think, Mom?

speaker: Mom
text: *Mom nods, tears welling in her eyes.* She's the most beautiful bride I've ever seen. I'm so proud of her.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary's eyes gleam with admiration.* And David, he seems to be the happiest man alive. It's beautiful to witness their love.

speaker: Mom
text: *Mom gives a loving squeeze to Mary's hand.* Yes, they are perfect for each other. It's a blessing to see them start their journey together.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary takes a deep breath, her eyes still fixed on the newlyweds.* One day, I hope to find someone who will look at me the way David looks at Anna.

speaker: Mom
text: *Mom turns to Mary, her eyes soft and understanding.* Oh sweetheart, I have no doubt that you will find that love. And remember, there's no rush. True love is worth waiting for.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary nods, her gaze thoughtful.* Yes, Mom. I'll remember that. It's just... I want what Anna has, you know?

speaker: Mom
text: *Mom's smile is gentle as she cups Mary's cheek.* And you will have it, my dear. In your own time, with the right person. Love isn't about finding the perfect person, but loving an imperfect person perfectly.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary smiles, a warm feeling spreading in her chest.* I'll keep that in mind, Mom. I love you.

speaker: Mom
text: *Mom pulls Mary into a comforting hug.* I love you too, my darling. Always.
